reporting-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre

title.narrative: The Kingdom’s support for the Yemen Humanitarian Response Plan for the year 2021 in the food security and nutrition sector.

description.narrative: The Kingdom’s support for Yemen’s humanitarian response plan for the year 2021 AD in the food security and nutrition sector, with an amount of (230,000,000) million dollars

Working to fill the humanitarian needs in the Yemen Humanitarian Response Plan for the year 2021 and the nutritional and nutritional gaps in the food security analysis report using the Integrated Food Security Phase Classification (IPC) in Yemen for stages (5) and (4).

participating-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre
